name: Bittermelon Breeze
preparation: In a shaker, combine vodka, lemon extract, watermelon juice, and Campari. Add ice and shake vigorously for about 15 seconds. Strain into a chilled highball glass filled with ice.
backstory: Combining the freshness of watermelon with the zing of lemon and the unexpected bitterness of Campari, this cocktail offers a sweet yet intriguingly bitter taste experience, specially crafted for those warm evenings.
